mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO ProjectInfo
(projectName, projectKind, projectConnector, qq, email, numNeed, projectNeed, projectStart, projectEnd, projectProfile) VALUES (#{projectName}, #{projectKind}, #{projectConnector}, #{qq}, #{email}, #{numNeed}, #{projectNeed , javaType = List , jdbcType = VARCHAR,typeHandler=cn.edu.swpu.cins.weike.typehandler.StringArrayTypeHandler}, #{projectStart}, #{projectEnd}, #{projectProfile})
mapper.select: SELECT projectName, projectKind, projectConnector, qq, email, numNeed, projectNeed, projectStart, projectEnd, projectProfile FROM ProjectInfo where projectName=#{projectName}
SELECT projectName, projectProfile, projectConnector, qq, email FROM ProjectInfo LIMIT #{offset},#{limit};
SELECT * FROM ProjectInfo WHERE projectProfile LIKE "%"#{keywords}"%"
